ComicInfo.Summary: Paris and Helen finally enter Troy only to meet frenzied outrage from Kassandra, the prophet doomed never to be believed. Despite Kassandra’s screams of protest and desperate appeals to her twin brother, the Trojan King has her dragged away to confinement. The celebration of Paris and Helen’s marriage continues with a little blood, a little sex.

ComicInfo.Title: Sacrifice 2
